name: Oblation (YakumoSothoth)
description: Players in this game will act as a cult priest. The goal is to keep the target alive and make him mad in order to let him become an oblation for your god. The target is moving towards the exit, players need to make his sanity gauge to zero before he escapes by controlling the illumination range of his torch. There are two kinds of monsters crawling on his way, one will decrease the target's health point while the other will decrease the sanity point.
